speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Michael Cashman, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the confiscation of automobiles by the Greek authorities ( 2005/2005(INI) ) ( A6-0394/2005 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Michael Cashman, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the confiscation of automobiles by the Greek authorities ( 2005/2005(INI) ) ( A6-0394/2005 ).
agenda_item: Confiscation of automobiles by the Greek authorities (debate)
